entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 24 Nov 2023 08:03:35
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Some OpenAI engineers make as much as $800,000 and were key players in Sam Altman's return
- Open Source is More Secure than Closed Source because Closed Source is More Secure than Open Source
- YouTube is now blocking Ad Blockers – So I just make ads run 16x faster
- NVIDIA AI Researchers Propose Tied-Lora: A Novel Artificial Intelligence Approach that Aims to Improve the Parameter Efficiency of the Low-rank Adaptation (LoRA) Methods
- Bluetooth stack modifications to improve audio quality on headphones without AA
- I’m trying so hard not to gush over Teenage Engineering’s latest gadget
- Episode 23/46: Implicit Imports & Signal-based inputs, Becoming Angular Contributor, DI deep-dive
- Choosing the Best Tech Stack for Your Project: A Strategic Guide
- This AI Research Presents Drivable 3D Gaussian Avatars (D3GA): The First 3D Controllable Model for Human Bodies Rendered with Gaussian Splats
- The Best Gaming Headsets, Chairs, Graphics Cards, Monitors And Gaming Accessories Of 2023

Business:
- Some OpenAI engineers make as much as $800,000 and were key players in Sam Altman's return
- Finns could be paid to use electricity tomorrow after a massive energy trade screw up
- CFTC says access to US customers 'is a privilege, not a right,' in aggressive case against Binance that is only just getting started
- Apple illegally denied benefits to the first unionized store in the country, says National Labor Relations Board
- Ozempic maker plans manufacturing blitz as market for the drug is expected to top $100 billion in 2030
- Colts owner who pled guilty to a DUI years ago now says he was arrested for being a 'rich, white billionaire'
- Saudi Arabia may make surprise oil cuts, sending prices soaring and the futures market into backwardation, says a 30-year energy expert
- The best Black Friday Nordstrom deals: Save up to 66% on clothing, shoes, beauty, and more
- RHOBH: Annemarie Wiley's Husband Marcellus Wiley Accused Of Alleged Sexual Assault - Screen Rant
- Sticky protein separation: Molecular glues on magnetic nanobeads - John Wiley

AI:
- Some OpenAI engineers make as much as $800,000 and were key players in Sam Altman's return
- Open Source is More Secure than Closed Source because Closed Source is More Secure than Open Source
- NVIDIA AI Researchers Propose Tied-Lora: A Novel Artificial Intelligence Approach that Aims to Improve the Parameter Efficiency of the Low-rank Adaptation (LoRA) Methods
- The first Spanish AI model earning up to €10k per month
- Weird New ‘Goddess’ Particle Found In Utah Has Scientists Spit-Balling Crazy Theories
- Weird New ‘Goddess’ Particle Found In Utah Has Scientists Spit-Balling Crazy Theories

Other:
- Streaking Wildcats visit Sun Devils for 97th Territorial Cup - KOLD
- ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’: How to Watch Season 13 Premiere Without Cable - Billboard
- Kids are getting sick from lead tainted applesauce, the FDA says
- U.S. Supreme Court Adopts Code of Conduct | Wiley Rein LLP ... - JD Supra
- A few cool things to play and watch over the long weekend
- Ex-Google maps designer doesn't like the app's new look, says it's 'colder' and 'less human'

Insights:
- OpenAI engineers are highly valued and well-compensated, with some earning up to $800,000.
- Open source software is considered more secure than closed source software, but there are differing opinions on this matter.
- YouTube's blocking of ad blockers has led to creative workarounds, such as making ads run faster.
- Advances in AI research, such as the proposed Tied-Lora method, aim to improve the efficiency of AI algorithms.
- The market for the drug Ozempic is expected to reach $100 billion by 2030, leading to plans for increased manufacturing.
- The Supreme Court's adoption of a code of conduct is a significant development in the legal field.
- The discovery of a new particle in Utah has sparked wild theories and speculation among scientists.
- The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills season 13 premiere can be watched without cable, providing options for viewers.
- The FDA has issued a warning about lead-tainted applesauce, highlighting potential health risks for children.
- The redesign of Google Maps has received mixed reviews, with some criticizing its colder and less human appearance.

Overall, this report covers a range of topics including tech, business, AI, and others. It provides insights into the salaries of OpenAI engineers, the security of open source software, the impact of YouTube's ad blocker blocking, advancements in AI research, the pharmaceutical market, legal developments, scientific discoveries, entertainment options, and consumer opinions on design changes.
